title: 1999/489/EC: Commission Decision of 5 July 1999 amending for the third time Decision 93/74/EEC concerning the status of Denmark with regard to infectious haematopoietic necrosis and viral haemorrhagic septicaemia (notified under document number C(1999) 1854) (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION
of 5 July 1999
amending for the third time Decision 93/74/EEC concerning the status of Denmark with regard to infectious haematopoietic necrosis and viral haemorrhagic septicaemia
(notified under document number C(1999) 1854)
(Text with EEA relevance)
(1999/489/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Decision 93/74/EEC is replaced by the Annex hereto.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 5 July 1999.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 46, 19.2.1991, p. 1.
(2) OJ L 189, 3.7.1998, p. 12.
(3) OJ L 27, 4.2.1993, p. 35.
(4) OJ L 72, 21.3.1996, p. 39.
